text: Taylor Swift has made an appearance on a new track for band Sugarland ( Picture : Getty ) Taylor Swift has made her return to country music with the release of a new track with duo Sugarland. The former country queen couldn ’ t help but return to her roots for the band ’ s new single, Babe, which dropped on Thursday night. And, as you could ’ ve guessed, it ’ s catchy as hell and oozes classic Swifty vibes. Partnering up with Train singer Patrick Monahan, Taylor wrote the song herself before offering it up to the band after they announced their return to music after a hiatus. The pair went their separate ways in 2012 in order to pursue solo projects and for Jennifer to give birth to her baby son, Magnus. Break - up anthem Babe was originally meant for Taylor ’ s
